ModMetaData.name: MorrowRim - Moon Sugar and Skooma
ModMetaData.author: SirMashedPotato
ModMetaData.description:
Adds moon sugar and skooma. Moon sugar is a somewhat addictive drug that reduces pain and relaxes the mind. It can be created from raw moon sugar cane, which is harvested from a new plant. You can also further refine it into skooma, which greatly increases its effectiveness, whilst also giving the consumer a slight boost of energy, however it eventually leaves them more tired than before.

-Supports Vanilla Achievements Expanded.
-Includes a patch that adds cooking grade moon sugar if Vanilla Cooking Expanded is enabled, a weaker version of moon sugar used as a condiment.
-Based on the 'Elder Scrolls' series by Bethesda Game Studios.
